name: cucumber-js
description: A simple sample project 'shouty.js' showing how to use cucumber-js combined with mocha and chai for development with Behaviour-Driven and Test-Driven Development.

scripts.test: mocha test/tdd/unit/* & cucumber-js -f @cucumber/pretty-formatter -f html:test/results/cucumber.html -f json:test/results/cucumber.json -f rerun:test/results/@rerun.txt

author: Kerry Harris
